Desc.CHS: 总在完美的时刻出现，猎人。我有消息要告诉你：弗拉多斯伯爵向你表达问候，但是他必须火速离开去摧毁立场墙。现在由你负责！
Last time I checked, vampires couldn’t stand daylight.
He is a modern vampire. Defying superstition and spontaneous combustion at the same time!
I wouldn’t worry for him. I haven’t seen daylight for a while in this smoke. Anyway, General Harker is busy preparing his next attack. Are you ready to employ your tactical genius?
But of course! I’m quite tactical. And a genius too. I'll visit the posts and give orders to the men.
I’m a hunter, not a commander! You deal with the soldiers, I go to the front line and wait for the attack.
